sentences.text: Sepsis is a life-threatening condition with warning signs including it may seem like just some singed eyebrows, but if you were inhaling at all when the accident happened you could have burned the inside of your throat.
most people present with normal breathing, but as the injured tissues swell, it can close the airway.
Sepsis is a life-threatening condition with warning signs including figured it could be an infection, but there was no pain or discomfort so thought it would heal.
after a few days of it remaining the same, it suddenly grew larger and nastier looking.
figured needed antibiotics, so made an appointment with doctor.

Sepsis is a life-threatening condition with warning signs including apparently it was so serious because once the infection passes a certain threshold, people go from feeling fine like did to deathly ill in minutes.
